job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: PRIMARY DUTIES<br><br>-Develop code in C#, which occasional work in C/C++<br>-Design and create GUIs for data analysis applications<br>-Enhance and debug existing coding and applications<br>-Perform unit testing and system-level testing of software<br>-Document software from an engineering and end-user perspective<br><br>SKILLS AND QUALIFICATIONS<br><br>-Must be a current US citizen and willing to work on-site and not remotely<br>-Expertise in C# (WPF and WinForms)<br>-Understanding of object-oriented programming<br>-Ability to perform multi-threaded programming<br>-Knowledge of TCP/IP networking<br>-Fluency with serialization via YAML, JSON, and XML<br>-Familiarity with C++<br>-Experience with databases, such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, and SQLite<br>-Prior use with development tools, such as Visual Studio, Git, and Buildbot<br>-Proficiency in unit testing and systems-level testing<br>-Empathy for users and a drive for customer delight
